definition: surname Wei/name of vassal state of Zhou dynasty from 661 BC in Shanxi, one of the Seven Hero Warring States/Wei state, founded by Cao Cao 曹操[Cao2 Cao1], one of the Three Kingdoms after the Han dynasty/the Wei dynasty 221-265/Wei prefecture and Wei county at different historical periods
same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
Wei of the Northern Dynasties (386-534), founded by the Tuoba 拓跋 branch of Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑
Wei Zhongxian (1568-1627), infamous eunuch politician of late Ming
Wei Zheng (580-643), Tang politician and historian, notorious as a critic, editor of History of the Sui Dynasty 隋書|隋书
Wei State (407-225 BC), one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Wei State or Cao Wei 曹魏 (220-265), the most powerful of the Three Kingdoms
Wei Wei (1920-2008), novelist and poet, author of award-winning novel The East 東方|东方 about the Korean war
Cao Wei, the most powerful of the Three Kingdoms, established as a dynasty in 220 by Cao Pi 曹丕, son of Cao Cao, replaced by Jin dynasty in 265
Wei county in Handan 邯鄲|邯郸[Han2 dan1], Hebei
lit. to besiege 魏[Wei4] and rescue 趙|赵[Zhao4] (idiom)/fig. to relieve a besieged ally by attacking the home base of the besiegers
Wei Yuan (1794-1857), Qing dynasty thinker, historian and scholar
Eastern Wei of the Northern dynasties (534-550), formed from the break-up of Wei of the Northern Dynasties 北魏
Western Wei of the Northern dynasties (535-557), formed from the break-up of Wei of the Northern Dynasties 北魏

sentences.english: Consequently, Cao Cao displaced Lady Ding and made Lady Bian queen of Wei.
sentences.chinese: 於是黜丁夫人，而立卞氏爲魏王后。

sentences.chinese: 魏海洋和哥哥說明了真相。

sentences.english: File Wei's theory under "Freakonomics, China edition."
sentences.chinese: 魏的理論則可以歸爲“中國版本的魔鬼經濟學”。

sentences.english: Yonhap said, Weisheng Luo and Li Yonghao talks were not disclosed.

sentences.english: Miaka and Taka looked at each other and giggled .
sentences.chinese: 美朱和魏看着對方，傻笑起來。

sentences.english: Wei, the furniture salesman, said he can wait.
sentences.chinese: 魏，前面提到的傢俱業務員，說他願意等。

sentences.english: Returning to Seoul from consultations in Washington, he said the launch will have consequences.
sentences.chinese: 魏聖洛說，北韓發射火箭將會有後果。

sentences.english: The news report says Wei stopped breathing when he reached a hospital.
sentences.chinese: 新聞報導說，魏文華到達醫院後已經停止了呼吸。

sentences.english: BDBD hedge agreed, but he stars must marry Wei Liner asked him.
sentences.chinese: 魏東籬同意，但是他要求厲辰星必須娶魏琳兒。

sentences.english: Ding Zong also discovered deep-sea of the Kingdom of Wei is secret, inflict pressure.

sentences.english: Long suffering Wei Shuyun suddenly hit the wall, with sacrifice all secrets.
sentences.chinese: 遭受重刑的魏淑雲突然撞牆，用犧牲保守了所有祕密。

sentences.english: As Mr. Weitzman points out, that’s enough to “effectively destroy planet Earth as we know it.”
sentences.chinese: 正如魏茲曼指出的那樣，這“足以摧毀地球。”

sentences.english: Zhao Tongda also undertakes investigating to Wei Haifeng.
sentences.chinese: 趙通達也對魏海峯進行調查。

sentences.chinese: 韓志傑不顧魏東籬的威脅，堅持去看魏琳兒。

sentences.english: Mr. Wi Sung Lac, chief of the ROK delegation to the Six-Party Talks came to visit China today.
sentences.chinese: 六方會談韓方代表團團長魏聖洛今天來華訪問。

class or grade/generation/plaintiff and defendant (old)/government department (old)
